item.title: Run Command from Container Instead of Locally
item.description: I encounter an issue where I don't have local composer installed but I need to run one. Solution is to run it on the fly from docker container: 1docker run --rm --interactive --tty --volume <directory_path_to_your_composer.json>:/app composer install
